## notifications package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [GlobalNotificationsComponent](./notifications.globalnotificationscomponent.md) | Notifications component for global messages |
|  [GlobalNotificationsService](./notifications.globalnotificationsservice.md) | Global notification service that is used for page global notifications |
|  [LocalNotificationsService](./notifications.localnotificationsservice.md) | Local notification service that should be used only within page notifications |
|  [MessageRendererDirective](./notifications.messagerendererdirective.md) | Creates dynamically instance of component by its metadata |
|  [Notification](./notifications.notification.md) | Class representing simple notification |
|  [NotificationMessageComponent](./notifications.notificationmessagecomponent.md) | Notification message component that represents simple message |
|  [NotificationsComponent](./notifications.notificationscomponent.md) | Notifications component for local messages |
|  [NotificationsModule](./notifications.notificationsmodule.md) | Module for notifications |
|  [NotificationsService](./notifications.notificationsservice.md) | Notifications service used for creating notifications |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NotificationMessage](./notifications.notificationmessage.md) | Component used for displaying notification message must implement this interface |
|  [NotificationMessageCss](./notifications.notificationmessagecss.md) | Css classes for default notification message |
|  [NotificationMessageOptions](./notifications.notificationmessageoptions.md) | Options for notification message |
|  [NotificationMessageService](./notifications.notificationmessageservice.md) | Represents service that can be used for obtaining notification message component type |
|  [NotificationsOptions](./notifications.notificationsoptions.md) | Options for notifications component |
|  [NotificationsOptionsCss](./notifications.notificationsoptionscss.md) | Css classes for notifications component |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NOTIFICATION\_MESSAGE\_OPTIONS](./notifications.notification_message_options.md) | Token for injecting options for notification message component |
|  [NOTIFICATION\_MESSAGE\_SERVICE](./notifications.notification_message_service.md) | Token for injecting service that can be used for obtaining type of component for notification message |
|  [NOTIFICATIONS\_OPTIONS](./notifications.notifications_options.md) | Token for injecting options for notifications components |
